# Generated by generate_HeadersTest.sh
# prefix: kdb
# link_libs: KDb
#
# WARNING! All changes made in this file will be lost!
#
# Test if all the installed headers can be included individually.
# This is a compile-time test.
#

add_custom_target(headers_test echo "headers_test: Creating HeadersTest files in ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} with builddir=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}, prefix=kdb, linking to libs [KDb]...")

add_custom_command(
    TARGET headers_test
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/generate_HeadersTest.sh ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR} kdb KDb
)

add_executable(
    HeadersTest
    HeadersTest.cpp
    KDb_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbAdmin_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbAlter_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbConnection_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbConnectionData_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbCursor_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbDriver_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbDriverManager_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbDriverMetaData_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbError_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbEscapedString_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbExpression_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbExpressionData_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbField_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbFieldList_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbFieldValidator_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbGlobal_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbIdentifierValidator_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbIndexSchema_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbLongLongValidator_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbLookupFieldSchema_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbMessageHandler_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbNativeStatementBuilder_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbObject_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbObjectNameValidator_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbParser_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbPreparedStatement_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbPreparedStatementInterface_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbProperties_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbQueryColumnInfo_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbQuerySchema_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbQuerySchemaParameter_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbRecordData_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbRecordEditBuffer_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbRelationship_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbResult_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTableOrQuerySchema_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTableSchema_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTableViewColumn_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTableViewData_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbToken_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTransaction_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTristate_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbUtils_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbValidator_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbVersionInfo_HeaderTest.cpp
    kdb_export.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    kdb_version.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    config-kdb.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbAdmin.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbAlter.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbConnectionData.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbConnection.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbCursor.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbDriver.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbDriverManager.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbDriverMetaData.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbError.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbEscapedString.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbExpressionData.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbExpression.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbField.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbFieldList.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbFieldValidator.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbGlobal.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDb.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbIdentifierValidator.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbIndexSchema.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbLongLongValidator.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbLookupFieldSchema.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbMessageHandler.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbNativeStatementBuilder.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbObject.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbObjectNameValidator.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbParser.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbPreparedStatement.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbPreparedStatementInterface.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbProperties.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbQueryColumnInfo.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbQuerySchema.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbQuerySchemaParameter.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbRecordData.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbRecordEditBuffer.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbRelationship.h_HeaderTest.cpp

    KDbTableOrQuerySchema.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTableSchema.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTableViewColumn.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTableViewData.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbToken.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTransaction.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbTristate.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbUtils.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbValidator.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KDbVersionInfo.h_HeaderTest.cpp
)

target_link_libraries(
  HeadersTest
  KDb
)
